alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Kane; Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 11:22AM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...A period of wet snow, freezing rain, and sleet is expected late tonight. After a break in the accumulating wintry precipitation for most of Thursday morning, wind driven snow is expected Thursday afternoon and early evening. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze are expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph Thursday afternoon. * WHERE...Lee, De Kalb and Kane Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
